mapper.insert: insert into tbl_recipereply(mno, bno, rno, content) values (#{mno}, #{bno}, seq_recipeReply.nextval, #{content})
mapper.update: update tbl_recipereply set bno = #{bno}, content = #{content}, updatedate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_recipereply where bno=#{bno} order by rno desc
